text:
Kami menginap di The Westin Surabaya hotel pd bulan Maret 2022 kemarin. Selama 6 hari. Kami senang sekali kamar kami di upgrade menjadi Club. 

Kami dapat menikmati makan malam di Westin Club, dimana makanan nya tidak basa basi. Mereka benar2 memikirkan menu yg akan di sajikan kepada tamu. 

Berbeda dengan Club di hotel Marriott lain yang makanan nya hanya basa basi. 
Bisa free flow minuman dari mulai yg beralkohol hingga minuman biasa. 

Untuk kamar nya kami mendapatkan kamar di pojok dan lebih besar dr kamar2 yg lain. 
Tempat tidur yg nyaman, kamar mandi yg nyaman. Yg di bersihkan setiap hari oleh Mas Adib, mas Rudi dan mas catur. 

Kolam renang dan Gym ada di lantai 6. 

The Westin Surabaya terletak di surabaya barat satu area dengan Pakuwon Mall. 
Yg dimana gampang sekali untuk mencari kebutuhan selama menginap. Tinggal ke bawah lalu masuk lewat area hotel dan sudah nyambung ke dalam Mall. 

Untuk bfast nya sangat berkesan. 
Kami mendapatkan special menu yg setiap hari disiapkan oleh Chef Syahrul Anwar. 

Selama kami di surabaya kami dibantu oleh team concierge ; dr mulai tanya tempat makan yg enak dimana, naik gojek dimana, tanya jalan lebih cepat lewat mana. Terima kasih banyak untuk team Concierge :
Pak yudha

Kalo ga ada mereka udah ribet dan bingung saya selama di surabaya karna ga tau jalan.

Kekurangan Westin hanya tempat parkir saja. Terlalu gelap, dan bikin bingung untuk yg pertama kali datang ke Westin Surabaya.

Saran :
Kepada yg terhormat GM The Westin Surabaya
Mohon belajar greeting kepada tamu.
Belajar senyum, dan lebih ramah. 
Saya hanya tamu lokal, bukan chinese, tp jangan diperlakukan seperti itu.
Tidak baik rasis terhadap tamu.

Sekali lg terima kasih banyak untuk seluruh team dari The Westin Surabaya Hotel

text:
Pada tanggal 31 Desember 2021, teoat oada new year eve, saya & keluarga menginap di The Westin Surabaya. Salah satu hotel bintang 5 di kota Surabaya. The Westin Surabaya termasuk salah satu dari Marriott Group. Well, as always, Marriott Group merupakan jaringan yang sangat tidak diragukan dalam pelayanan, kualitas & kebersihannya. Selama ini saya tidak pernah kecewa dengan pelayanan dan fasilitasnya. Untuk kamar super mantap, bikin anak2 saya super happy, saya memilih kamar dengan king bed. Kamar tidur & kamar mandi super bersih. Pool juga Instagramable banget.
Untuk staff juga super baik, super gercep, pokoknya mantap pol 👍🏻

text:
Westin Surabaya is one of the best hotels in Indonesia. They have great, trusting, kind staff. The executive rooms are quite delicate and gorgeous. I personally like the bathrooms, comfy beds and middle living room between a connecting room. Finally this hotel has great conveniency 

First and foremost, I enjoy the great conveniency of the hotel. As it is places next to pakuwon mall: which boast a wide range of restaurants and shops. The straight access to pakuwon mall makes life far easier. It is so easy to get food or something by just taking the elevator. 

Next, the staff here are very attentive, kind and gentle. They are also very trusting. A few people remember me from my last visit and are trustful. They will always do their job and are persistent in helping. They always are positive. Lastly, even when they deliver food to our hotel, they do it in a formidable manner.
Furthermore, the rooms here are very delicate and extravagant. I personally like the 4 bottles of free water they give here; however I preferred the plastic aqua compared to glass Cleo. In addition to this, the beds are very soft and they supply a lot of charging ports. A minor issue is that my aircon was a bit faulty. When I lowered the temperature, it would reset to 24.5 degrees, however this did not occur in the past. Also sometimes the shower is slow to change enperatuee.

This hotel also has a good reputation and has a very clean look, the rooms are always clean and I have never had any issues with that. 
Also this hotel has a great buffet. They have quite an abundance of cuisines. They serve authentic Indonesian food as well as western food. The deserts are okay, but the ice cream is very nice. The rawon and Soto Ayam were quite nice. I appreciate the toppings they offer to make these dishes ready their full potential of taste. The staff at the buffet are once again kind and offer drinks or food. There are chefs who cook sirloin or beef, and there is a chef who makes eggs. These are all good in my opinion.

To summarise, this hotel has great conveniency, food, staff and rooms. I love this hotel and find it the best Indonesia has to offer. All the staff here are so kind attentive. I will definitely be coming back when I stay in Surabaya.
title: Great staff, rooms, conveniency and food

text:
Recently enjoyed my second multi-night stay at the Westin Surabaya and was wanting to share the wonderful experience my partner and I had thanks to the friendly staff.

First, let me mention the service as the highlight, I've stayed at many Marriott properties around the world and this was one of the best hospitality teams I've met. We'd requested some arrangements for a birthday and a special event, and all the staff went out of their way to make the weekend special, with a hand-signed card from many of the staff we met regularly to some extra decorations in the room, and greetings whenever we walked by an associate. My partner was so happy and it's an event and stay she'll never forget I'm sure. Special thanks to Gavin who made all the magic happen and credit to the club team led by Malvian, and other managers such as Neni and Rizal. When you are staying at this hotel, you can count on them to listen to any situation and take appropriate actions while making sure all guests are feeling welcome.

Second, if you are familiar with the Westin brand, there's always meant to be a healthy vibe, and Westin Surabaya expressed this with good food, both in the main restaurant where the morning buffets were full of rotating selections every day by Chef Sahrul and Chef Nur who were happy to cater to special dietary requests and advise on local delicacies, and healthy and delicious F&B in the club lounge (such as daily special cocktails with fresh ingredients prepared by the club staff including Stephanie, Dyta, April and Kiki), there's onsite yoga and jogging sessions some mornings, and an amazing rooftop pool. The gym and recently opened L'Occitane Spa were also good places to exercise and relax.

Lastly, for Bonvoy members, the club lounge here is excellent, a nice environment with plenty of tables and, as mentioned above, excellent F&B choices, well worth it for an upgrade coupon if your Bonvoy status doesn't give it.  Club Rooms are on the top three floors and we've had a chance to try both deluxe and suite at this hotel and everything is wonderful, a good modern interior design.

Also as a note to other travelers, this hotel is located at the Pakuwon Mall in a newer upscale area of Surabaya, lots of green and trees, so it is not in the traditional downtown areas, but as a result its quieter, has fast access to the highway for trips to the airport or Bromo and elsewhere, and the Mall has everything you might need. I like it for that reason.
title: Favorite hotel in Surabaya

text:
Our stay at Westin was the highlight of our entire holiday in Surabaya. Having arranged stays at 3 different establishments to enjoy different experiences, I now understand the reason why it is so highly rated in Surabaya. Staff are empowered to provide customer satisfaction and consistently take pride in their work to ensure that hotel guests are happy. I have stayed in other Marriott locations before but I have to admit that Westin Surabaya comes out tops. 

The property sits atop a huge shopping mall and is situated beside its sister hotel, Sheraton. We were greeted by Patrice at guest reception and were offered an option to upgrade our stay to the Grand suite with lounge access at a special rate, while our teenage children stayed in an adjoining room which was interconnected. The extra space was wonderful and the suite felt luxurious with separate living and dining areas, bath, shower and toilet stalls as well as a walk-in wardrobe. Our room attendants were rotated throughout our stay but were all dexterous and very thorough with housekeeping duties. 

The ladies in the club lounge (helmed by Manager Neni and entire team comprising Nadya, Dyta, Michelle, Angel, etc.) were warm and friendly yet polite and extremely professional. They made sure we were served our food at our table, minimising as much guest contact with the food to maintain hygiene standards. We greatly appreciated this, especially since our son came down with a mild case of food poisoning from eating outside the hotel premises. His absence was duly noted when we visited as a family of 3 one evening and a pot of freshly brewed ginger tea was sent directly to the room for him to calm his upset stomach (thank you Nadya 🙏🏼). 

Over at Magnolia, Executive Chef Salim lends a personal touch by getting to know guests at each table. He offers suggestions on what to try and creates the dish to send to your table. Both my husband and daughter have celiac so it was a great surprise that they had the option of gluten-free bread available for breakfast. The wait staff (Rudi, Ivan & Irfan) are quick to clear dishes and go the extra mile to bring juices, coffee and even local dishes for you to sample. They displayed great initiative and were always on standby. 

At checkout, Hervan patiently assisted us with our payment, additional queries and offered to help us arrange a breakfast box since our flight was an early one the following day. Our stay here has been impeccable to say the least and I hope that management recognises the need to continue to empower staff and maintain such high service standards to ensure the hotel’s longevity. We will definitely patronise Westin when we visit Surabaya next year.
title: Impressive

text:
I put a lot of expectation knowing that this is the Westin brand, with not-so-cheap price (in fact, the most expensive in Surabaya!).

I was not disappointed. From entering the lobby with the luxury details, the ambience, the refreshing scent... I knew I paid for premium services. I guess for Westin with city-type, The Westin Surabaya succeeds capturing the best of luxury side of Surabaya, in a hotel. Convenient access to Pakuwon Mall, the mesmerizing view from Club Lounge Level 39 Floor, and enjoying my wine at Sky Lounge.

I will definitely tell good stories about Westin, and set my next Surabaya visit immediately.
title: The luxury part of Surabaya, nestled in one hub. 5-Stars!

text: A pleasant surprise for us when visiting Surabya. Though it is located at West Surabaya, a bit far from where our meeting was, the trip is worthwhile. All about this hotel is just right, from the service to all the hotel facilities are great (maybe since it is still quite new). I would say this Westin in Surabaya is even better than the one in Jakarta from all aspects. We booked the suite which is amazing and the standard room also quite nice, though we dont get to have the premium coffee and ferragamo soaps. Union around corner opened till 2 AM and the hotel is attached to the largest Mall in southeast asia (from what I heard). However, I have not really used all the hotel facilities and I skipped the breakfast (because I was way too full from prior night meal). The only thing that a bit bother me is the blind installed in all the bathroom including in the suite room, where it is very noticable it is wrinkly and not properly installed. A bit crack inthe almost perfect experience. However, i would still rate the hotel 5 star for everything else.
title: The best hotel in town

text:
My family and I recently stayed at The Westin Hotel Surabaya for the first time during Eid Al Fitr holidays. It was our first experience to stay at a hotel after two years of hiatus due to Covid 19 pandemic. The hotel is adjacent to one of the largest shopping malls in Surabaya, The Pakuwon Mall. It offers an excellent access to the mall without having to step outside from the hotel entrance.

We booked an Executive Suite (78sqm/839sqft) including daily breakfast at Magnolia. Upon check in we were offered an upgrade by Ridho (one of the receptionists) to Westin Grand Suite (97sqm/1044sqft) with some extra charges and accepted his offer since not only did we get daily breakfast but also daily dinner at The Westin Club.

Both Magnolia and The Westin Club offer a variety of international menus. The taste has always been excellent. The services that were provided at both restaurants were outstanding.

Speaking about our room, it is located at level 38 and very, very spacious. It has a separate dinning area, a washroom next to the foyer, a living room equipped with a huge 55 inch TV screen. The master bedroom has an extra large King Bed with another 55 inch TV plus a huge master bathroom with a walk-in closet and a working desk.

The housekeeper did a great job in maintaining our room clean and tidy through out our stay.

All in all we really enjoyed our stay at The Westin Surabaya. All of the hotel staff whom we met were excellent, attentive and very helpful. 
Special thanks to Prasetyo, Ridho, Amel, Neni and her team at the Club, Gunawan, Patricia, Rebecca, Yonathan, Chef John, Chef David and your colleagues as well as other staff you really deserve a five star rating badge.

We hope to see you all again in our future stay.
title: Wonderful Stay at an Excellent Hotel

text:
Starting from our curiosity about Magnolia Restaurant that appeared in one of the @luxuryestaurantaward IG feeds, we decided to include Westin Surabaya in our anniversary celebration trip. And the first impression we got was that we had made the right decision. We were very impressed from the moment of arrival, at breakfast, even when we passed one of your staff in the elevator or in the hallway. They always ask how our stay was and if there is any feedback that needs to be improved. At the restaurant, Miss Rebecca even remembered the drinks we ordered the day before and gave us a surprise anniversary pancake. And we are also very impressed with Mr. Nigel (concierge), Mr. Agus who delivered extra mineral water (even left a sweet note next to the mineral water), Mr. Pilip who always remembers our names, Miss Amel who serves us when checking in, and Miss Patrice who communicates via whatsapp to prepare room that exceed our expectations.

Thank you for the hospitality during our visit. We enjoyed everything about our stay at Westin. From the moment of our arrival to our last minute at Westin, we were treated like royalty. The guest room was a great viewing area and I enjoyed the stunning scenery of the restaurant. We were deeply touched by your warmth and surprise for our anniversary. We had one of the most beautiful memories and can’t wait to spend our next vacation with you again.
title: Unforgettable memories at Westin

text:
Decided to give special birthday present to my wife, it was a “me-time + family staycation” at one of the best hotel in Surabaya The Westin.  

It was a great experience we got and I can tell it is beyond our expectation.  It started with a call from the hotel staff: Cynthia from the front desk to prepare our stay one day earlier, and I mentioned that this stay is for my wife birthday, and she accomodate by making surprise for decorating the room and give special birthday cake to welcome my wife that did the check-in earlier.  It was so great and my wife loved it!  Special thank for Cynthia and Patrice for preparing this!

The hotel is located at the very popular mall in Surabaya (Pakuwon Mall), so it has a direct access to the mall which is very convenient.  And also it is actually the same building with Four Points hotel.  It has welcome lobby for dropping guests and the main lobby for check-in check-out. This is really decent hotel by all the modern style interiors.  The room is spacious, very new, modern and clear.  Bed is comfort and bathroom is also spacious.  

Good experience on the breakfast, a lot of choice and the food also great!  I have 2 young children and the hotel is generous enough not to charge my 8 years ikd daughter.  

All staffs were all friendly and helpful.  My special thanks for Cynthia and Patrice that were very kind and accomodaring during the stay, I requested a late check out and they also accomodated this, so we can leave at 2 PM. 

Overall, this is a great experience for me and my family will be unforgetable.  It is well worthed and as I mentioned  before that the service is beyond our expectation.  I really recommend The Westin Surabaya!
title: Beyond Our Expectation

text:
Been staying in some Westin Hotels in and i can say this is the best Westin experience i’ve had so far. I have come here multiple times and can’t imagine a nicer hotel in Surabaya. One of the newest property in Surabaya, with wonderful staff and amazing services. Mr Gavin is the one who helped me with the checkin process, it was seamless, only few minute and you’ll be on your room. Also,
most of the staff will greet you by name which is amazing.

And it is luxurious! I particularly like how every room is wonderful; you do not need to book the highest-end rooms, as you do in some hotels, to have access to features like a splendid bathroom in your room, plus the gym and pool.

As the hotel rooms are on the upper floors of this high-rise, every view is a gem. The window wall is one of my favorite features, with a long window seat that reminds you there is plenty of pleasure to be had just sitting with a cup of coffee and a sweet and cozying up in your room.

Even the standard rooms are spacious and immaculate. Small thoughtful treats will greet your arrival in your room. Beds are extremely comfortable. Temperatures are easily regulated. Wi-fi is free and fast. Amenities such as kettles, coffee maker, refrigerator, iron, and hair dryer are all there for you. You will wish you could just decide to live there for the next year.

It is located in a building with a mall on the lower floors, including a gourmet grocery, restaurants, etc. The stores even keep late hours.

Basically? Its a first class service in a form of hotel.
title: First class experience in Surabaya

text:
Stayed with family at Westin surabaya at 14-17 January and 20-23 January.

And let me tell you, this is THE best hotel in surabaya, and is probably one of the best in Indonesia.

Location of the hotel was very good, as it was connected to Pakuwon mall.

Check in was very very Swift, handled by Berry, who took the time to explain to us the different kinds of rooms.

By the way, room is very very clean. Spot on clean. With a HUGE 55” TV. Bathroom is also very clean.

Next morning, come breakfast time, WOW, the variety of the food is enormous. Thank you Mr. Bagus for the excellent food served every day during breakfast. The hashbrown in amazing, the bacon is so juicy. And Westin has got the best French toast I’ve tasted in years. Thanks also to syaiful for always attending to us during breakfast, for refills, and other stuff.

Another thank you for Ms. Puput, even though was very busy... She took the time to talk to my seven year old daughter after breakfast, thank you for the coloring book and pencil, you made our daughter very happy.

We had a very nice experience at Westin executive club on the very top floor, f&b was amazing, service was marvelous, and the views of surabaya, was awesome. Thank you Bella who served us very well, what a very friendly gal.

Room service was very quick, and very well done, especially mbak via who cleaned up after our messy room.

One more thing, our stay wouldn’t be this perfect without the service and assistance of Ms. Patrice. You have made our 5 night stay a very memorable one. Westin Surabaya is very lucky to have you. Thank you very much.
title: Simply amazing

text:
This is the second time i stayed at The Westin and both i might say were unforgettable. This time we stayed at The Westin to celebrate our anniversary and only a day before had i decided to contact The Westin for a possibility to arrange a room decor to surprise my husband. I didn’t expect much being so last minute but they were all so welcoming and cooperative. Patricia the GRO contacted me right away to attend to my need. She handled everything so wholeheartedly considering she didn’t have enough time to prepare much but she managed to pull through.

Since the moment we arrived until the last moment we left, had been a bliss. Our anniversary wouldn’t be feeling this perfect without the details of your impeccable hospitality. 

From helping me arrange this small, last minute surprise for my husband, packing the bread and juice at the breakfast for me to go, til the very late check out so we managed to catch up with our sleepless night, you guys are just awesome! 

Hotel is just another building without the special touch of the personals. This is sadly what most 5* hotels have forgotten. But I’m impressed that The Westin being in Surabaya city, willing to use the international standard and thus set a high bar for other 5* hotels in town.

Hope you won’t lose this identity you have set and keep being the best hotel in town.

Need to mention Gavin for the cake and greeting card. And Amel at the reception for helping me to change my booking. 

I’ll see you guys soon! Missing the magnificent breakfast already!
title: Simply unforgettable.

Staying here on December during Christmas but havent got a chance to wrote review.

This hotel just opened few months before our stay, everything was brand new. We stayed for a night during weekend. 
Check in process was fast and efficient, staff was attentive and friendly. We booked 2 rooms, both king bed room. 
The room was nice, shiny clean and comfortable. I love their bed and pillow. Bathroom was spacious and clean, good water pressure, good aminity and good ambience too.

Breakfast provides various menu with generally good taste, service was excellent, i dont know is it due to low level occupancy or is it their normal standard but we have 1 staff assisting in almost everything. They help my kids to choose food, changing the plates when it fulls and change with new one, etc. 
We love the experience. Plus they provide hygienic wipes in every table so we can clean up cutteleries before using it. Its very nice.

I love the experience and will coming back.

text:
During this pandemic, more and more people are doing road trips. This time, on our way back to Jakarta from Bali, we decided to stop in Surabaya. Based on experience, the perfect transit hotel during road trips would be something not far from the toll road. And Westin Surabaya definitely has the perfect location. 

After a long drive, all we need is a relaxing atmosphere. From the moment we stepped on the premise, we can tell that it was the perfect choice. We love everything about the hotel. The new building, the friendly service, but most of all, we loved the breakfast! We don't see many hotels that have teppanyaki for breakfast, it was truly something. 

True, it's located inside a busy mall, but they always have valet service if you're too tired to find parking :)

We feel like one day was not enough.
title: Just the perfect stop on a roadtrip...

text:
After pandemic since early 2020, this place is the best & largest space available for table serving banquet events. It could accommodate around 400-500 pax (6 pax per table) out of 2,310 pax in 10 pax table seating or 4,500 standing full reception buffet style. Size 3,542m² in the Grand Ballroom alone has made it one of the venue place available in Surabaya as substitute to the former SSCC in PTC mall (within Pakuwon Mall area).

The Grand Ballroom is located in M1 floor. One building with Four Points hotel & Westin Hotels on the upper level. 

Tonight, the wedding venue was considered one of the best & most elegant glamour event with dark black ambience curtains glittered with small crystals lighting. Thousands of fresh flowers decorations are fantastic & grandeur style. 

Food quality from Bird's Nest cold soup as the opening course, Lobster, Shark Fins + Abalone soup, Black Angus steak, Fish Cod as the final main course have exceptionally delicious. Variety of sweet sour desserts as the closing menu.

The good quality of Ballroom services by the 8 event captains with its waitresses & waitress team. Superb excellent facility & amenities of the surrounding areas. 

It's surely a 5* plus for the place & facility, the food serving quality, the staff services.
title: The best Grand Ballroom with 5* plus in Surabaya

text:
The Westin Surabaya is one of the new luxury hotel in Surabaya which had just been opened at December 2020. This is one of the best hotel I’ve ever visit and I feels like home because of their hospitality start from the reception until our departure. They have 2 lobby : entrance lobby (drop off area & connecting to mal) and sky lobby (reception and Magnolia restaurant)

I was worry if I couldn’t get room with bathtub because me and my husband want to celebrate our wedding anniversary with a special room, but Mr. Gusti Ridho was very helpful to fulfill our request. He is very kind and friendly. He also gave us the best Deluxe Room (room 3101) which located in the corner and complemented by bathtub.

Room itself was very spacious. They have big cupboard and also provide many hangers. They also provide iron & ironing board, safe deposit box, coffee/tea maker, and mini refrigerator. They use heavenly bed which made us don’t want to leave the bed because of its comfort. There were 2 sofa and round table.
Bathroom was also very spacious. They separate bathtub, shower, and toilet into 3 area. 

We also get surprise from the hotel due to our wedding anniversary. Bed was decorated beautifully and they give us anniversary cake & earl grey which were very tasty. 

During breakfast, Mr. Syaiful really help us. He also gave attention to my son because he didn’t eat well. He asked if we didn’t mind if he replace our menu with the new one (with my son’s favorite because of spicy fried rice). 
This hotel gave excellent service in all sector, included valet service. We was very upset because we couldn’t parking our car d/t parking area crowd. My husband then complaint to the valet service staff and Mr. Zam apologized to us and gave us prompt solution. He also free us valet service fee.

Overall, I really enjoyed excellent hospitality in all sector of this hotel. The Westin has perfect location because integrated with Supermall Pakuwon Indah and also has a comfort room, beautiful interior, tasty breakfast. One thing that may be considered to provide : Kids Club (or I missed it?) to make this hotel more perfect.

Consider covid-19 situation, this hotel implement good health protocol.

I give warm regards to Mr. Gusti Ridho, Mr. Syaiful, Mr. Zam, Ms. Tania Christabella, and to all staff.
title: Perfect luxury hotel with excellent location

text:
We stayed at the brand-new Westin for 5 nights and booked using Marriott Bonvoy Points. Thanks to my Gold status, we were upgraded into an Executive Suite and the FO-team even added club benefits, which are usually not part of the upgrade. The suite was fantastic, very spacious and located in the corner of the building with huge panoramic windows in the bedroom and living room. Tasteful, modern interior design with decent fresh colors and of course the super-comfy Heavenly Bed will let you sleep like a baby. The suite was always properly cleaned and disinfected and the housekeeping team added a nice personal touch every day by leaving some nice hand-written notes and sweet surprises. 
I had the chance to see also the “regular” Deluxe Rooms, which are smaller, but of equal high standard and certainly worth to stay in as well.
The F&B quality is excellent and the whole team provides an extremely attentive and professional service. There was a roast-beef carving station on the first morning of our stay and when I asked 2 days later if this will be offered again, Pak Rudy at Magnolia Restaurant advised that the breakfast will be a la carte for the other days due to low hotel occupancy. The roast-beef is not part of the a la carte breakfast menu, but Rudy noted our wish and in the next morning we were served another delicious portion of roast beef with sides as per our choice at no extra cost. What an incredible service!
The service in general is what makes the hotel really outstanding. Literally everyone in the hotel knew our names, from the bellboys, to the FO and restaurant staffs. 
The Sky Lounge offers stunning views over West-Surabaya and the team there really went above and beyond every day during our visit. Huge thanks to Sylvi, Anin and their other colleagues for treating us truly like a Royal! The club benefits include a selection of drinks and sweet + savory snacks from 5.30 - 7.30pm and it was an absolute pleasure being served by this extraordinary attentive and friendly team at the Sky Lounge.
The hotel sits right on top of Pakuwon Mall, which can be accessed right from the welcome lobby and offers endless shopping and dining options.
I have been waiting for the opening of The Westin Surabaya for quite a while, but it definitely was worth the wait. It is by far the best hotel I visited in Surabaya and I even would go as far as saying it is the best city hotel I have ever experienced in Indonesia. 
Can’t wait to be back there soon again!
title: Best hotel in town

text:
The Westin Surabaya located at Pakuwon Mall superblock, opened its door early Dec 2020. At this premium location, we will be spoiled with a pleasant stay especially when we stay with family.

Checked in during weekend the hotel quite busy with wedding reception.
From arrival to departure, I experienced excellent and pleasant service. All staffs were friendly and polite.

My luggage up handled by concierge before we enter the room, perfect!
Front desk check in was handled well by Udin (Concierge), he took initiative for key-in process as two desks were occupied by other guests. As Bonvoy member, my room was upgraded to Club Room 38th floor (without Club benefit), appreciated it. Check in process less than 10 minutes.

Room condition 100% perfect, very clean, modern interior design, Westin bath amenities, and the best thing is the bed (truly the Westin heavenly bed). 

Breakfast experience also went well. Icha (hostess) pointed us to the table near window where we can oversee nice view of the city. Excellent buffet breakfast variety from local to western presentation. I think they still can improve in term of social distancing by putting rope stand at each island of the buffet. Vernando (waiter) and Heru (Manager) mingled and they prompted a question if I have comments on the breakfast. Chef Bayu also friendly and attentive, he recommended “Lontong Sayur” a local dish for a good start of breakfast.  We met and gab with Tyo (Learning & Development Manager), he greeted guests warmly at the lobby area.   

Overall, we satisfied with The Westin Surabaya service and facility. Extraordinary and kudos for all staffs (security, concierge, front desk agent, hostess, Chef, FB team). Thank you to Ms. Sally Fadjrina for wonderful hospitality.
title: Extraordinary Service
